NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Repair and maintenance services of boilers
Repair and maintenance services of central heating

CODIF_DATA.AA_AUTHORITY_TYPE: Ministry or any other national or federal authority
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C03

TITLE.P: RFT for the Provision of Boiler Maintenance Services

SHORT_DESCR.P: Gas Boiler Systems Maintenance Services and Oil Boiler Systems Maintenance Services, including ancillary plant, the scope of which may include planned preventative maintenance and servicing together with reactive maintenance, modifications and call out service. The Office of Government Procurement intends to invite submissions from companies / organisations with expertise and capability relating to the delivery and provision of Gas and Oil Boiler Maintenance Services. This would involve the establishment of a competitive multi-supplier national framework with the division of Lots in geographic areas.
Category A: Maintenance Services for Gas Boiler Systems and Ancillary Plant.

AC_QUALITY.AC_CRITERION: Tenderer’s Proposed Approach to Provision of the Services
Tenderer’s Quality Control Proposal
Tenderer’s Continuity of Supply Proposal
Tenderer’s proposed Management Information and Account Management Methodology
